subject: Technology
title: Donkey Kong and the Birth of Nintendo
description: A short lesson to help you apply Donkey Kong and the Birth of Nintendo.

hook.text: Before Mario was Mario, he was Jumpman, a carpenter trying to rescue his girlfriend from a gorilla.

buildup.text: Shigeru Miyamoto designed Donkey Kong in 1981. He had never made a video game before.

discovery.text: The game introduced platforming: jumping over obstacles across multiple levels with a story.

twist.text: Nintendo of America almost rejected the game. They thought the name 'Donkey Kong' sounded ridiculous.

climax.text: Donkey Kong became a massive hit and launched two of gaming's most iconic franchises.

punchline.text: A first-time designer and a silly name created gaming history.

quiz.question: What was Mario originally called in Donkey Kong?
